text: @JoeBiden @ElastigirlVotes U.S. Northern Command executed plans to prepare for a potential pandemic the first week in February. An executive order issued by the Joint Staff directed Northern Command and geographic combatant commanders to initiate pandemic plans. Meanwhile, Trump went golfing.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
